name: DeadPlan (irpea)
description:
DeadPlan is a fun and futuristic top down shooter mobile game in which you control an android that is built for the purpose of defending the base from waves of alien invaders.  To make things more interesting, your base has it's own defense, turret funs. They are used when your android gets killed protecting the base and they are very effective for mowing down aliens. How many waves can you survive in this chaotic environment filled with guns and aliens?

The game is still in development and you can try out free demo. 

Lives:

Defend your base by all means necessary. Androids have their life points and can die, but you have limitless amounts of androids at your dispense. But if your base get's destroyed, it's game over.

Enemies:

You goal is to get rid of waves aliens who are trying to destroy your base. Kill them with guns or turrets, it's your choice.
